All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator user with elevated privileges in the Atlas Events system.
AdminBase
Abstract base activity for all admin-related screens in the Atlas Events application.
AdminDashboardActivity
Activity displaying the admin's dashboard with a list of available events.
AdminTest
 
ComposeNotificationActivity
Activity where organizers compose and send notifications to entrants of a specific event.
CreateEventActivity
Activity for creating new events in the Atlas Events system.
DebugNotificationActivity
 
EditEventActivity
Activity for editing existing event details.
Entrant
Represents an entrant user who can join and participate in events.
EntrantAdapter

Abstract base activity for all entrant-related screens in the Atlas Events application.
EntrantDashboardActivity
Activity displaying the entrant's dashboard with a list of available events.

Represents a list of entrants for an event.

Activity for displaying and editing entrant profile information.

EntrantSearchActivity
Activity that allows entrants to browse and search through available events.

EntrantWaitlistIntentTest
Simple Espresso intent tests for entrant waitlist operations.
Event
Represents an event in the Atlas Events application.
EventDetailsActivity
Activity for displaying detailed information about an event.
EventDetailsAdminActivity
Activity for displaying detailed information about an event.
EventManageActivity
Activity for organizers to manage an existing event.
EventRepository
Repository class for handling CRUD operations on Event objects in Firebase Firestore.
EventRepository.EventCallback
Callback interface for operations that return a single event.
EventRepository.EventsCallback
Callback interface for operations that return a list of events.
EventRepository.EventUpdateCallback
Callback interface for event update operations.
EventTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
ImageUploader
Utility class for handling image uploads and deletions in Firebase Storage.
ImageUploader.DeleteCallback
Callback interface for handling the result of an image deletion.
ImageUploader.UploadCallback
Callback interface for handling the result of an image upload.
LoggedInUser
Data class that captures user information for logged in users retrieved from LoginRepository
Notification
 
NotificationCenterActivity
Notification Center - Where organizers pick which event to send notifications for.
NotificationHelper
Utility class for displaying user notifications in the application UI.
NotificationHelperTest
Instrumented tests for the NotificationHelper class.
NotificationHistoryActivity
Notification History - Shows notifications based on user type.
NotificationHistoryHelper
Helper class for loading and displaying notification history.
NotificationHistoryHelper.MarkAsReadCallback
Interface for handling mark-as-read requests from notification cards.
NotificationHistoryHelper.NotificationLoadCallback
Interface for callbacks when notifications are loaded or fail to load.
NotificationHistoryHelperTest
Unit tests for the NotificationHistoryHelper class.

NotificationIntentTest
Simple Espresso intent tests for notification screens.
NotificationListener
Listens for real-time notifications for a specific user and handles their display.

// * Unit tests for the NotificationListener class.

Simple helper class to manage real-time notification listeners across different activities.

Listens for real-time changes to event waitlists and notifies organizers.

This class will be responsible for salting and hashing passwords amd checking password match Ensures passwords are not stored as plaintext

Handles user session management within the Atlas Events application.

User
Represents a generic user in the Atlas Events application.
UserRepository
Repository class for managing User-related data operations in Firebase Firestore.
UserRepository.BlockedOrganizersCallback
Callback interface for blocked organizers operations
UserRepository.IsBlockedCallback
Callback interface for checking if an organizer is blocked
UserRepository.NotificationsPrefCallback
 
UserRepository.OnEntrantFetchedListener
Listener for retrieving an Entrant object from Firestore.
UserRepository.OnOrganizerFetchedListener
Listener for retrieving an Organizer object from Firestore.
UserRepository.OnUserFetchedListener
Listener for retrieving a general User object from Firestore.
UserRepository.OnUserUpdatedListener
Listener for user update operations, providing detailed status codes.
UserRepository.OnUserUpdatedListener.UpdateStatus
Enumeration representing possible outcomes of user update operations.
